This blog will cover theoretical aspects of algorithm design for large data processing. You can subscribe via RSS. See also a friendly collaborative project sublinear.info.


The idea to start a blog was inspired by other educational events that I started:

  • 15-Hour Crash Course on Big Data at the University of Buenos Aires: http://grigory.us/big-data.html
  • Big Data Reading Group at the University of Pennsylvania: http://grigory.us/big-data-reading.html
  • Sublinear Algorithms for Big Data Day at Brown University: http://grigory.us/big-data-day.html </ul> </div>


    For more resources on sublinear algorithms you are welcome to check (and contribute to) this list.
